installation.script:
apt -y update
apt -y --no-install-recommends install curl lib32gcc1 ca-certificates xz-utils

## download and install steamcmd
cd /tmp
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamcmd
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steamcmd
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamapps # Fix steamcmd disk write error when this folder is missing
cd /mnt/server/steamcmd

# SteamCMD fails otherwise for some reason, even running as root.
# This is changed at the end of the install process anyways.
chown -R root:root /mnt
export HOME=/mnt/server

## install game using steamcmd
./steamcmd.sh +login anonymous +@sSteamCmdForcePlatformType windows +force_install_dir /mnt/server +app_update ${SRCDS_APPID} validate +quit 

## set up 32 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32
cp -v linux32/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk32/steamclient.so

## set up 64 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk64
cp -v linux64/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk64/steamclient.so

## install wine and winetricks
apt install -y --install-recommends wine wine64 xvfb cabextract

mkdir -p /mnt/server/.wine


curl -sSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Winetricks/winetricks/master/src/winetricks -o /usr/sbin/winetricks

curl https://dl.winehq.org/wine/wine-mono/6.0.0/wine-mono-6.0.0-x86.msi -o /tmp/wine-mono-6.0.0-x86.msi

wine msiexec /i /tmp/wine-mono-6.0.0-x86.msi

chmod +x /usr/sbin/winetricks

export WINEPREFIX=/mnt/server/.wine
export WINEDLLOVERRIDES="mscoree,mshtml="
export DISPLAY=:0
export DISPLAY_WIDTH=1024
export DISPLAY_HEIGHT=768
export DISPLAY_DEPTH=16
export AUTO_UPDATE=1
export XVFB=1

xvfb-run --auto-servernum winetricks -q --force win7 vcrun6 vcrun2019 corefonts d3dcompiler_43 d3dx9 dotnet40
